第三斜方柱: rhombic prism of the third order

第二斜方柱: rhombic prism of the second order

第一斜方柱: rhombic prism of the first order

第三正方錐: pyramid of the third order; tetragonal

第三六方錐: pyramid of the third order; hexagonal

第二（三）三角錐: pyramid of the second (third) order; trigonal

第二六方錐: pyramid of the second order; hexagonal

第一三角錐: pyramid of the first order; trigonal

第一（二）正方錐: pyramid of the first (second) order; tetragonal

第一（二）三方柱: prism of the first (second; third) order; trigonal

第一（二;三）正方柱: prism of the first (second; third) order; tetragonal

第一（二;三）六方柱: prism of the first (second; third) order; hexagonal
